unnormalised: Entertainment News: Music Streaming Goes Mad, Yaar!
normalised: entertainment news: music streaming goes mad, yaar!

unnormalised: Mumbai - Are your ears ringing? Is your phone yelling "Buffering!" more than your mother-in-law yells at your cooking? You're not alone! Music streaming platforms are officially in a "Kabhi Khushi Kabhie Gham" level of dramatic chaos.
normalised: mumbai - are your ears ringing? is your phone yelling "buffering!" more than your mother in law yells at your cooking? you're not alone! music streaming platforms are officially in a "kabhi khushi kabhie gham" level of dramatic chaos.

unnormalised: Reports suggest "RagaRave," the desi answer to Spotify, is considering adding a "Silence All Sharma Family Whatsapp Groups" button for just Rs. 99/month. Genius!
normalised: reports suggest "ragarave," the desi answer to spotify, is considering adding a "silence all sharma family whatsapp groups" button for just rupee ninety nine per month. genius!

unnormalised: Meanwhile, "StreamIndia," allegedly funded by a shadowy group of NRIs from New Jersey who just *really* miss Lata Mangeshkar, is promising to beam music directly into your brain via your local pani puri wala's stall's wifi. Safety not guaranteed, but guaranteed to be cheaper than therapy!
normalised: meanwhile, "streamindia," allegedly funded by a shadowy group of N R I s from new jersey who just *really* miss lata mangeshkar, is promising to beam music directly into your brain via your local pani puri wala's stall's wifi. safety not guaranteed, but guaranteed to be cheaper than therapy!

unnormalised: Even IIT Delhi is getting involved! Apparently, they’re developing an algorithm to predict the exact moment your cousin Ravi will start singing off-key at the next wedding, and then automatically queue up a Honey Singh track to drown him out.
normalised: even I I T delhi is getting involved! apparently, they’re developing an algorithm to predict the exact moment your cousin ravi will start singing off key at the next wedding, and then automatically queue up a honey singh track to drown him out.

unnormalised: Industry insiders say this increased competition means only one thing: more free trials! Get ready to sign up for everything and forget to cancel, because let's be honest, who actually *reads* the terms and conditions? May God bless us all. And data caps.
normalised: industry insiders say this increased competition means only one thing: more free trials! get ready to sign up for everything and forget to cancel, because let's be honest, who actually *reads* the terms and conditions? may god bless us all. and data caps.
